data.name: Trash Panda: Raccoon's City Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo of Trash Panda is a single "level" (referred to as a "neighbourhood" in-game), with all game mechanics intended for the initial full release. This demo version will include two Steam Achievements.
data.about_the_game: This demo of Trash Panda is a single "level" (referred to as a "neighbourhood" in-game), with all game mechanics intended for the initial full release. This demo version will include two Steam Achievements.
data.short_description: A playable demo of the small, chill, low-fi raccoon simulator, where you play as a raccoon roaming neighbourhoods of Toronto making a mess. Knock over trash bins, find power-ups, challenge other raccoons, and get lost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Use of controller recommend.
